cells.block_code:
def on_start(container):
    phantom.debug('on_start() called')
    
    # call 'format_1' block
    format_1(container=container)

    return

cells.title: END

cells.block_code:
def format_1(action=None, success=None, container=None, results=None, handle=None, filtered_artifacts=None, filtered_results=None, custom_function=None, **kwargs):
    phantom.debug('format_1() called')
    
    template = """| savedsearch find_peers server={0}"""

    # parameter list for template variable replacement
    parameters = [
        "artifact:*.cef.destinationHostName",
    ]

    phantom.format(container=container, template=template, parameters=parameters, name="format_1")

    run_query_1(container=container)

    return
cells.name: format
cells.title: format

query.description: Query to run (in Splunk Processing Language)

cells.block_code:
def run_query_1(action=None, success=None, container=None, results=None, handle=None, filtered_artifacts=None, filtered_results=None, custom_function=None, **kwargs):
    phantom.debug('run_query_1() called')

    # collect data for 'run_query_1' call
    formatted_data_1 = phantom.get_format_data(name='format_1')

    parameters = []
    
    # build parameters list for 'run_query_1' call
    parameters.append({
        'query': formatted_data_1,
        'command': "",
        'display': "",
        'parse_only': "",
    })

    phantom.act(action="run query", parameters=parameters, assets=['esaabb100'], callback=format_2, name="run_query_1")

    return
cells.name: run query
cells.title: Investigate

cells.name: prompt

cells.block_code:
def format_2(action=None, success=None, container=None, results=None, handle=None, filtered_artifacts=None, filtered_results=None, custom_function=None, **kwargs):
    phantom.debug('format_2() called')
    
    template = """peer {2}

%%
*communicated {1} with {0} with severity {3}*
%%"""

    # parameter list for template variable replacement
    parameters = [
        "run_query_1:action_result.data.*.peer",
        "run_query_1:action_result.data.*.count",
        "artifact:*.cef.destinationHostName",
        "run_query_1:action_result.data.*.priority",
    ]

    phantom.format(container=container, template=template, parameters=parameters, name="format_2")

    prompt_1(container=container)

    return
